channel.title: charlie on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in charlie on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Shane died
item.description: 06:12 Monday 20 November 2017 JST Just found out that Charlie died yesterday. Don’t have details (intentional / accidental). I called Dad, but immediately went to voice mail. I guess he is talking to them already. 20:55 Wednesday 29 November 2017 JST I misunderstood. It was Shane, not Charlie.
